/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding a touch of urban life to the otherwise serene setting. In the distance, buildings rise, their architecture hinting at the blend of traditional and modern styles that characterize Beijing. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the colors of the surroundings.
